links.*: The Lord of the Rings MUSH (1993 video game)
The Lord of the Rings MUSH II

wikitext.*:
'''Christopher "Sagar" Anderson''' was the writer and game designer of [[The Lord of the Rings MUSH (1993 video game)|The Lord of the Rings MUSH]]<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/lotrmush.html The Lord of the Rings MUSH] at Tolkien Games (retrieved 7 March 2011)</ref> and [[The Lord of the Rings MUSH II]].<ref>[http://www.lysator.liu.se/tolkien-games/entry/lotrmush2.html The Lord of the Rings MUSH II] at Tolkien Games</ref>
